Package org.neo4j.internal.schema

Interface SchemaRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SchemaDescriptorSupplier
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConstraintDescriptor, IndexBackedConstraintDescriptor, NodeExistenceConstraintDescriptor, NodeKeyConstraintDescriptor, RelExistenceConstraintDescriptor, UniquenessConstraintDescriptor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstraintDescriptorImplementation, IndexDescriptor
    public interface SchemaRule
extends SchemaDescriptorSupplier
    Represents a stored schema rule.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • sanitiseName

        static String sanitiseName​(Optional<String> name)

      • sanitiseName

        static String sanitiseName​(String name)

      • generateName

        static String generateName​(SchemaDescriptorSupplier rule,
                           String[] entityTokenNames,
                           String[] propertyNames)
        Generate a deterministic name for the given SchemaDescriptorSupplier. Only SchemaRule implementations, and IndexPrototype, are supported arguments for the schema descriptor supplier.
        Parameters:
        rule - The SchemaDescriptorSupplier to generate a name for.
        entityTokenNames - The resolved names of the schema entity tokens, that is, label names or relationship type names.
        propertyNames - The resolved property key names.
        Returns:
        A name.

      • getId

        long getId()
        The persistence id for this rule.

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        The (possibly user supplied) name of this schema rule.

      • withName

        SchemaRule withName​(String name)
        Produce a copy of this schema rule, that has the given name. If the given name is null, then this schema rule is returned unchanged.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the new schema rule.
        Returns:
        a modified copy of this schema rule.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given name is not null, and it fails the sanitise check.
